name: Phantom Limb (TechyDylan)
description:
In 2029 and you are all alone. In the darkness with no one around you. You notice some glowing dust coming out of the trash bin and you walk towards It and all of a sudden It Jumps Into your hand. You notice a shotgun with bullets on the floor and you walk closer and closer until you notice a glow around It asking for you to pick it up.  Then you start looking around and you notice a vending machine which is asking for your dust, In which you give It to you and out comes a bunch of bullets... All of a sudden you are rushed by a bunch of ghosts and you are left alone to fight it...

What Is the Goal? 
The Goal Is To Survive and not let those pesky ghosts kill you. 

Disclaimer* - All Assets and Music used were made within 72 Hours for the Mini Jam #117
